name: Joseph Lee Recreation Center
description: Features: - Accessible Children's Play Area - Accessible Picnic Area - Accessible Restroom - Athletic Field - Available for Rentals - Basketball - Community Room(s) - Gymnasium - Playground - Restrooms Visit this thriving community center in the Bayview District and you’ll find a wide selection of games, sports, programs and classes. Play basketball, ping-pong, tetherball or air hockey. Join a pickup game on the multipurpose field or sign up for an arts & crafts workshop at the clubhouse.
